DOC.brief_title: Phase 3 Placebo Controlled Study Nolasiban Improve Pregnancy Rates Women Undergoing IVF/ICSI
DOC.detailed_description: The study prospective , randomize , parallel group , double-blind , placebo-controlled study confirm efficacy safety oxytocin receptor antagonist , nolasiban , 760 woman undergo fresh embryo transfer follow vitro fertilisation ( IVF ) intra-cytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) .
